A new high-pressure press, procured in 1963, which in turn was replaced with a new offset press in 1976. It has in turn been expanded and modernized to today a fully modern facility.  In his will ordered Axel Johansson executors to ensure "that the newspaper is edited in a liberal, not in förbudistisk, Nonconformist, or social democratic spirit."
